issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Although support for the "runOnUiThread" annotation element was apparently removed in release 1.8.0.1, it is still used in a number of places in the platform code.

At the best, this is misleading. At the worst, it may be used in places that actually _should_ be invoked on the UI thread. It may also lead community members or module developers to use this element in their own code.
fields.summary: Obsolete "runOnUiThread" annotation elements should be removed

comments.body: Closing ticket due to time passed and lack of progress for a number of years. Please open a new ticket if there are any problems.
